title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING (MOU) WITH THE BAMBANG SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL REPRESENTED BY ITS SCHOOL PRINCIPAL MR. ARVIN C. DIAMANTE AND WORK IMMERSION FOCAL PERSON MR. NEIL EFRAIM A. TANDANG FOR THE WORK IMMERSION PROGRAM (WIP) OF THE ACADEMIC INSTITUTION'S SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS REGISTERED UNDER THE ACADEMIC YEAR 2025-2026.
